elements.title: Ileana Rodriguez
elements.contents: ... that the first flag carried in the 2020 Paralympics opening ceremony will be that of the International Paralympic Committee (pictured), with Ileana Rodriguez as the flag-bearer?

elements.title: Rukhshana Media
elements.contents: ... that Rukhshana Media is named after a young woman called Rukhshana who was stoned to death in Afghanistan in 2015?

elements.title: Dale Snodgrass
elements.contents: ... that in 1985, Captain Dale Snodgrass was chosen as "Fighter Pilot of the Year" and was called the real "Maverick" from Top Gun?

elements.title: Lake Letsie
elements.contents: ... that there are no trees around Lake Letsie, since its entire catchment area is above the tree line?

elements.title: Carl Cotton
elements.contents: ... that Carl Cotton was the first black taxidermist to work at the Field Museum of Natural History after being hired in 1947?

elements.title: Remember Love
elements.contents: ... that John Lennon and Yoko Ono recorded Ono's song "Remember Love" in a Montreal hotel room that has been a tourist draw ever since?

elements.title: KCON
elements.contents: ... that radio station KCON in Conway, Arkansas, shut down twice on March 10?

elements.title: Hedgehog Flavour Crisps
elements.contents: ... that the manufacturers of Hedgehog Flavour Crisps were taken to court under the Trade Descriptions Act as they did not contain actual hedgehog?
